parameters.filterJson: ={{ JSON.stringify({ and: [{ property: '時間', date: { equals: $json.nextSaturdayDateText } }] }) }}

parameters.jsCode:
const quoteToken = $('Split Out').all().map(item => item.json.message.quoteToken)[0]

return [
  {
    "type":"text",
    "text":[
      '🛠️ 指令列表',
      '----------',
      '（提醒：中文請用全形）',
      '',
      '【查詢類】',
      '1) 未繳費名單',
      '@Dobby owe',
      '@Dobby 欠',
      '',
      '2) 查看指令列表（本頁）',
      '@Dobby command',
      '@Dobby 指令',
      '',
      '3) 查詢季度報名人',
      '@Dobby participants',
      '@Dobby 報名人',
      '別名：@Dobby people',
      '',
      '4) 查詢最新公告',
      '@Dobby news',
      '@Dobby 公告',
      '別名：@Dobby announcement',
      '',
      '5) 查詢付款資訊',
      '@Dobby payment',
      '@Dobby 付款',
      '',
      '【報名 / 請假類】',
      '1) 報名零打（1 位）',
      '@Dobby +1',
      '',
      '2) 報名兩位（2 位）',
      '@Dobby +2',
      '',
      '3) 取消報名',
      '@Dobby -1',
      '',
      '4) 季租成員請假',
      '@Dobby 假',
      '',
      '5) 季租成員銷假',
      '@Dobby 銷假',
    ].join('\n'),
    "quoteToken": quoteToken,
    "quickReply": {
      "items": [
        {
          "type": "action",
          "action": {
            "type": "message",
            "label": "未繳費名單",
            "text": "@Dobby owe"
          }
        },
        {
          "type": "action",
          "action": {
            "type": "message",
            "label": "指令列表",
            "text": "@Dobby command"
          }
        },
        {
          "type": "action",
          "action": {
            "type": "message",
            "label": "季度報名人",
            "text": "@Dobby participants"
          }
        },
        {
           "type": "action",
           "action": {
             "type": "message",
             "label": "最新公告",
             "text": "@Dobby news"
           }
        },
        {
           "type": "action",
           "action": {
             "type": "message",
             "label": "付款資訊",
             "text": "@Dobby payment"
           }
        }
      ]
    }
  }
]
return [{json:{done:true}}];
